modelComparison.heading: AI Model Comparison
modelComparison.description: Select the right design model for your needs
items: Modern Style: Sleek lines, minimalistic approach, versatile
Cozy Style: Warm colors, soft textures, comfortable ambiance
Industrial Style: Raw elements, modern finishes, bold statements
Bohemian Style: Eclectic mixes, vibrant colors, artistic flair
Traditional Style: Classic decor, elegant furnishings, timeless appeal
Transitional Style: Balanced blend of traditional and modern
Contemporary Style: Current trends, open spaces, fresh aesthetics

relatedAITools.heading: Related AI Tools
relatedAITools.description: Discover more AI solutions for home and design

items.question: What design styles can I create?
items.answer: Our AI generator offers various styles including modern, cozy, industrial, bohemian, and traditional—allowing you to easily create the perfect look for any room.

items.question: Can I change the layout of the furniture?
items.answer: Yes! You can drag and drop furniture elements within the design mockup to find the perfect arrangement that suits your space.

items.question: What types of images work best for uploading?
items.answer: Clear, well-lit photos of your space yield the best results. Ideally, images should capture the entire room with minimal clutter.

items.question: How many designs can I generate at once?
items.answer: You can generate multiple designs simultaneously, allowing you to experiment with various styles and layouts effortlessly.

items.question: Is there a limit on design revisions?
items.answer: No, you can make as many revisions as you like until you're completely satisfied with your design!

items.question: What is the pricing model for the AI Interior Design Generator?
items.answer: WaveSpeed operates on a pay-as-you-go model, allowing you to pay only for the designs you generate with no subscriptions.

items.question: How fast will I get my designs?
items.answer: Designs are generated in as little as a few minutes, making it easy to visualize your ideas quickly!

items.question: Can I save my designs for later use?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can save your designs to revisit and modify them at any time.

items.question: Are there commercial rights for generated designs?
items.answer: Yes! All designs generated through WaveSpeed include full rights for personal and commercial use.

items.question: What support is available for troubleshooting?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive support including tutorials, FAQs, and customer service to help you with any issues.
